column2: Powerful strike fails to land solid. It still does some damage.
column4: Weak side strike glances off kidneys. It could have been great.
column6: Knuckle foe's arm. You will need to do better than this.
column8: Back strike. It has little imagination. You might as well punch.
column10: Strike lands on shoulder blade.

column2: Foe seeks to push you away. He lashes out in defensive manner.
column4: Glancing side blow. You unbalance your foe. He recovers quickly.
column6: Strike side. Foe moves back to block your next attack.
column8: Blow to foe's side sends him reeling. Foe checks wound for the damage.
column10: Blow to foe's side unbalances him and destroys equipment there.

column2: On line strike, but weak. Foe steps back and feigns an attack to draw off your assault.
column4: Your strike makes foe's footing uncertain. He pushes you clear and begins to right himself.
column6: Shot to foe's chest. His lungs hesitate. He coughs it off and regains his footing.
column8: Quick shot to chest causes foe to hesitate in pain. He still knows you're there.
column10: Crack! Foe's rib reports damage to him in an unsubtle way. He is in pain.

column2: Attempt to spin foe around almost succeeds. Weak grip to side.
column4: Your assault threatens to succeed. Your foe goes defensive to avoid your attack.
column6: Boom! Foe is hit in the face. He reels back 5 feet trying to regain his footing. His guard is down.
column8: Double strike to both arms breaks foe's defense. He is open to attack and is having trouble recovering.
column10: Shot in back staggers foe for an instant. His guard drops and he is sadly unprotected.

column2: Firm press to foe's chest. He give ground happily. Watch his weapon.
column4: Grab foe and bring knee up to cause damage. Foe blocks some of the force.
column6: Push foe's knee backwards. Foe struggles to avoid the pain.
column8: Strike to chest takes wind out of foe. Foe's guard goes down.
column10: Knock foe over as if he was a sack of beans. He hits and starts to stand up.

column2: Strike thigh. Foe is pushed back.

column8: Miss foe's side and strike his thigh. You have initiative for 3  rounds.
column10: Strike causes foe to fumble his stride. He almost falls down. Foe is recovering.

column2: Foe's arm is pinned for a moment. He recovers by twisting you off.
column4: Bend weapon arm in wrong direction. Foe drops his weapon.
column6: excellent placement. Strike to weapon arm disarms foe. Foe is in great peril.
column8: You catch foe's counter thrust and disarm him with a bash to the arm.
column10: Bash foe in shoulder making him spin. You push him for good measure.

column2: Shoulder strike sends foe spinning. He comes all the way around before stopping. Well placed shot.
column4: Strike to foe's elbow numbs it. He drops his weapon and grips his elbow. He forgets you are still attacking him.
column6: Strike to foe's leg sends him down. Foe's knee is broken and his doom is at hand. He falls to the ground helpless.
column8: Hard strike to head. If foe has no helm, he is knocked out for 24 hours. If he has a helm, he is knocked back 10 feet.
column10: Knock foe back with a blow to the jaw. Foe loses balance and falls. He hits his head and goes unconscious.

column2: Hasty press upon foe's chest produces excellent results. Foe is unbalanced.
column4: Grab loose piece of foe's garments and use it to throw him around. Foe is confused.
column6: Strike to foe's ribs. Foe's ribs crack and foe shows the pain. His war effort is impaired.
column8: Break foe's collar bone. Spin foe around. He is disoriented and out of position.
column10: Shoulder strike blasts foe down. He lands on his stomach and tries to roll over. Minor fracture.

column2: Hammer foe's lower leg. He has trouble standing, but manages.
column4: Solid damage to foe's calf. His attempts to avoid the pain makes him an easier target.
column6: Bruise foe's leg. Muscles suffer damage and foe limps back from your reach.
column8: Lift foe up into the air. You send him sprawling on the ground. He drops his weapon.
column10: Knock foe down with a blow to the thigh. He lands on his weapon and takes some time to get off it.

column2: Blow to foe's shield side. If foe has a shield, it is torn away.
column4: Grab foe's shield arm for leverage. You treat it badly, trying to unbalance foe.

column8: Swep foe to the side and knock him over. He breaks his ankle.
column10: Strike to foe's shield arm. Foe stumbles 3 feet and falls down. Foe is disarmed.

column10: Awesome side shot sends foe tripping sideways. He goes down rolling and breaks a leg.

column2: Head strike. If foe has no helm, he is knocked out for 2 hours. If foe has a helm, he is better off.
column4: Blow to side foe's head. Strike damages his ear and balance. Foe is impaired for 3 weeks.
column6: Spin foe around. He ends up 10 feet from you and facing the wrong direction. Foe fumbles his weapon.
column8: Foe stumbles back from you 10 feet and takes a full round to fall. He hits hard and fractures an arm. He is down.
column10: Blow to foe's shield shoulder. If foe has no shield, he is knocked down, has a useless arm and passes out.

column2: Strike to foe's stomach. He bends down in pain and you send him sprawling on his face. He hits harder than you could have hoped.
column4: Bash foe in his side. His legs forget to follow as he steps back. He falls in an embarrassing prone position. He has no clue to what happened.
column6: Smooth and snazzy strike sends foe down on his knees. His weapon goes flying. Foe has blacked out. He stares straight ahead without blinking.
column8: Strike head and shatter foe's helm. Pieces fly in all directions. If foe has no helm he is in a coma for 4 weeks.
column10: Solid strike snaps foe's neck. He falls back 5 feet, spins and tumbles to the ground. He dies of shock and suffocation in 3 rounds.

column2: Brutal hip strike knocks foe down. Fall tears tendons and fractures a bone in leg. The pain is great. Foe is incoherent for 9 hours.
column4: Send foe flying 10 feet. He lands on his face. The twisting of his neck causes nerve damage. He is paralyzed from the waist down.
column6: Powerful strike flips foe into the air before smashing him to the ground. Foe breaks both arms and hits his head. Foe is in a coma for 2 months.
column8: Savage blow to foe's head. Foe is knocked down. He falls into a coma and dies in 12 rounds due to a severed vein.
column10: Frightening strike to foe's head. Temple crushed, neck broken. Foe lands 20 feet away. He dies instantly.
